properties.address: 6 The Causeway, Bishop’s Stortford, Bishop's Stortford, Hertfordshire CM23 2EJ
properties.description: A large, warm, ground floor public library with comfortable seating, PCs, sofas, children's area, newspaper area, study spaces, accessible toilet, thousands of books, and helpful friendly staff. Joining the library is free. Weekly fun activities and regular events.
properties.title: Bishop's Stortford Library

properties.address: 34b South Street, Bishops Stortford, Hertfordshire CM23 3AZ
properties.description: All are welcome, fully accessible different activities cater for lonely and isolated, but families singles and children most welcome Open to all, Tues-Thurs 10-4pm Fri & Sat morning with a Changing places facility including a hoist. A Foodbank , CAB, Bereavement and Memory cafe also meet on the premises (times vary) Craft groups on Tuesday morning, with cakes available Wed, Thurs & Sat
properties.title: Bishops Stortford Methodist Church

properties.address: Hockerill Christian Centre, Bishop's Stortford, Hertfordshire CM23 5HE
properties.description: We provide free tea, coffee, savouries & cakes. We can also provide a free hot light lunch. We have pool, table tennis, the daily newspapers and lovely people to chat with. We provide free tea, coffee & cakes. We can also provide a free hot light lunch. We have pool, table tennis, the daily newspapers and lovely people to chat with.
properties.title: Café Connect

properties.address: The Ford, Little Hadham, Herts SG11 2BP SG11 2BP
properties.title: LITTLE HADHAM VILLAGE HALL

properties.description: Open to those of all faiths and none. The church is open every day from 9am-3pm and the Lady Chapel is a warm and cosy quiet space. Free weekly session for Ukranian guests; monthly TLC session for those feeling isolated; fortnightly craft group
properties.title: St Michael's Church and Windhill Churches Centre

properties.description: Thirst Youth Café is a safe space, run by Bishops Stortford Youth Project for young people to come, eat, relax, play and enjoy each other’s company whilst also being a place where they can be creative, receive support and advice from experienced youth workers and positive role models. Our doors are always open to anyone aged 11- 18.
properties.title: Thirst Youth Café

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 1st November 2024** Open to all for refreshments/food and and warm place to relax and meet other people
properties.title: Warm Place at the Hub Church

properties.address: Little Hadham Village Hall, The Ford, Little Hadham, Ware SG11 2BP
properties.description: Local venue offering a wide range of activities in support of the local and wider community, including Welcome Cafe, Digital Inclusion workshops to boost computer skills and hall hire for parties.
properties.title: Little Hadham Village Hall Trust

properties.address: 34b South Street, Bishop's Stortford, Herts CM23 3AZ
properties.description: A café lounge with various activities on during the week and a donation-only café

properties.description: Bishop's Stortford Library offers a wide range of services including activities, workshops and an IT Champion offering digital support.
